repliclust.maxmin.blueprint.validate_reference_quantity¶

repliclust.maxmin.blueprint.validate_reference_quantity(ref_qty=1.5, min_allowed_value=1, name='aspect_ref')¶

Check that a reference value exceeds its minimum allowed value.
